title: How to Make Chocolate and Vanilla Bon Bons

steps.headline: Take ALL of the Oreos and pour them into the blender and set it on 'Chop.'
steps.description: Let it 'chop' until the Oreos are small pieces. Take the mashed up Oreos and shape them into little balls. Take out a pan and aluminum foil or a cookie sheet and set them to the side.

steps.headline: Take the bars of chocolate and vanilla and slice them up into thin pieces.
steps.description: Put the pieces of chocolate/vanilla in TWO different bowls. Put them in the microwave or when melted. Let it cool.

steps.headline: Once the melted chocolate is cooled down, take a spoon and pour the mixture over the ones you want to have chocolate or vanilla.
After you have done that, put them in the refrigerator for about 25-30 minutes.

text: Take ALL of the Oreos and pour them into the blender and set it on 'Chop.' Let it 'chop' until the Oreos are small pieces. Take the mashed up Oreos and shape them into little balls. Take out a pan and aluminum foil or a cookie sheet and set them to the side. Take the bars of chocolate and vanilla and slice them up into thin pieces. Put the pieces of chocolate/vanilla in TWO different bowls. Put them in the microwave or when melted. Let it cool. Once the melted chocolate is cooled down, take a spoon and pour the mixture over the ones you want to have chocolate or vanilla.  After you have done that, put them in the refrigerator for about 25-30 minutes.  Enjoy the dessert you made!
